channel.title: Bundle of Holding "Forged in the Dark" Bundle: includes BitD, Wicked Ones, CBR+PNK, and more
channel.description:
![](upload://w1SqqScUu1qM5VNAbe6wMRBMWbo.jpeg)
For just **US$9.95** you get all *five* complete games and scenarios in our **Starter Collection** (retail value **$54.50** ) as DRM-free ebooks, including the dungeon-delving adventure *Into the Dark* ; the fairy-tale melodrama *Errant Deeds: Tall Tales in the Blackwood* ; the minimalist (two-pamphlet!) cyberpunk adaptation *CBR+PNK* (and its ready-to-play scenario *Mind the Gap* ) -- and yes, once again we include John Harper's *Blades in the Dark* core rulebook itself (previously in last December's *Blades in the Dark* Bundle), along with four unofficial *Blades* playbooks.
And if you pay more than the threshold price of $35.04, you'll **level up** and *also* get our entire **Bonus Collection** with *six* recent standalone games and supplements worth an additional **$95,** including Mythic Gazetteer's brand-new RPG of paranormal investigation and office politics, *External Containment Bureau* ; Bandit Camp's *Wicked Ones,* a tabletop answer to the *Dungeon Keeper* and *War for the Overworld* computer games; *Sig: City of Blades* (Genesis of Legend Publishing), a standalone Forged recasting of the spiritual successor to *Planescape, Sig: Manual of the Primes* (2016); *Copperhead County,* about crime and corruption in Tennessee; and *Disaster/PEACE - A Magical Girl RPG* (A Couple of Drakes).
Ten percent of your payment (after gateway fees) goes to this Forged offer's pandemic-related charity, [Direct Relief](https://www.directrelief.org/emergency/coronavirus-outbreak/). Direct Relief sends protective gear and critical care medications to health workers, with emergency deliveries to medical facilities across the US and to regional response agencies across the world.
